address2: Tower D No. 36, North Third Ring East Road Dongcheng District
longBusinessSummary: BBMG Corporation, an investment holding company, engages in green building materials, and property development and operation businesses in Asia, Europe, Africa, and internationally. The company's Green Building Materials segment is involved in the manufacture and sale of cement and concrete, building materials, and furniture; and provision of commerce logistics and services. Its Property Development and Operation segment develops and sells properties; invests in properties; and offers management and security services to residential and commercial properties. The company also provides crushed stone, coatings, glass made spectacle lenses, dry and mixed mortar, construction hardware, aerated concrete and woodbased panels, refractory materials and ceramic, prefabricated parts, steel and iron pipes, clinker, plastics-steel doors and windows, aggregates, high voltage porcelain insulators, machinery equipment and accessories, wind power equipment, limestone, decorative materials, and ferrous metal castings. In addition, it offers contracting, building material quality testing, advertising design and production, construction engineering, inspection and identification technical, business, financial leasing, road transportation, hotel management, technology development, transfer, consulting, accommodation and catering, financing advisory, supply chain management, building decoration, rental, park management, conference and exhibition, project construction, engineering design, knitting, human resources, labor dispatch and intermediary, and solid waste treatment services. Further, the company wholesales building and metal materials; publishes concrete world magazine; imports and exports bulk commodities; and operates sports projects. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.
